content: Yesterday, I started making non fully backwards compatible changes. For now, I removed the files lean4-dev and lean4-debug. I'm going to announce here all changes that will likely cause users to change their config files. If you rely on some functions other than customizable settings, please tell me.
I'd propose to maintain the changelog file instead of requiring users to read Zulip messages.
I'm going to add this to the changelog file, then use both zulip and changelog in the future.
So that users who update via a semi-automatic process will be notified about breaking changes, if they read either changelog or zulip.
